title: A Facebook page I manage is not showing the like button to Facebook users instead, it is only showing the follow button. This happened about 7 days ago. How do I fix this problem? - Quora

response.answer_text: It may be due to privacy, you have to go to settings and check that the page is published or unpublished, if it is unpublish then make it publish then do everything as public in the setting section. And there an option called add button section there you have to add like and follow and watch button, whatever button you want to add. I think your problem will solve, if any doubt then ask me. I go to add button section but it cant edit and i havent permission to bring like button
